data.description: A Rural Bank ONE Farm Management Deposit (FMD) is an effective risk management tool that allows primary producers to set aside and earn interest on pre-tax income from profitable years and use it when needed most. This is especially important for rural producers with uneven income streams.
data.name: Variable Rate Farm Management Deposit

fees.name: Bank cheque fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies per bank cheque you request. This fee will not be debited to your FMD.

fees.name: Bank cheque repurchase or stop fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies per bank cheque you request to be repurchased or stopped. This fee will not be debited to your FMD.

fees.name: Real time electronic or international funds transfer
fees.additionalInfo: Applies the same day you request a transfer to an account at another financial institution in Australia, or an international funds transfer. This fee will not be debited to your FMD.

fees.name: Copy of a cheque
fees.additionalInfo: Applies per cheque when you request a copy of a cheque deposited to your account. This fee will not be debited to your FMD.

fees.name: Real time electronic or international funds trace
fees.additionalInfo: Applies per request. Note: The receiving bank may also impose a fee. The trace fee will be waived if the trace reveals an error by Rural Bank. This fee will not be debited to your FMD.

fees.name: Electronic recall
fees.additionalInfo: Applies per attempt to recall an electronic transaction. The fee is charged even if the recall is unsuccessful. This fee will not be debited to your FMD.

fees.name: Audit request
fees.additionalInfo: Applies per audit requested on an account. This fee will not be debited to your FMD.

fees.name: Transaction history record
fees.additionalInfo: Applies per request per statement period for a transaction history print out on an account. This fee will not be debited to your FMD.

fees.name: Administration fee
fees.additionalInfo: An administration fee of $15.00 per 1/4 hour applies for the supply of information, retrieval of a voucher or other documentation, or other special services you request. This fee will not be debited to your FMD.

fees.name: Physical security token (issue and replacement)
fees.additionalInfo: Key-ring sized token that improves the security of Internet Banking. Applies per token ordered. This fee will not be debited to your FMD.

fees.name: Electronic Trace
fees.additionalInfo: Applies when you have requested a trace on a Bpay® or Pay Anyone transaction that has been sent electronically to another financial institution. The trace fee will be waived if the trace reveals an error by Rural Bank. This fee will not be debited to your FMD.

fees.name: Staff assisted transfer fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies per request to transfer money to an account held with another financial institution or a Rural Bank account in another name. This fee will not be debited to your FMD.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Every applicant must have access to Rural Bank Internet Banking
Customer must be a primary producer with an off-farm taxable income of less than $100,000 per annum
Only available to Australian primary producers
Can only be opened in the name of an individual
Subject to farm management deposit scheme eligibility guidelines

constraints.additionalInfo: The total of all FMD’s held in a client’s name must not exceed $800,000

features.additionalInfo: Designed for primary producers who’ve earned a taxable non-farm income of $100,000 or less over a financial year
You can have more than one Farm Management Deposit, up to a combined value of $800,000 per farmer
